p: Samples of basil ( Ocimum basilicum) were collected in Basrah, Iraq, and authenticated by the horticulture faculty at the College of Agriculture University of Basrah, Basrah, Iraq. Basil leaves were washed with distilled water, crushed in a blender, and then sealed in plastic bags and stored at −18 °C for two days before freeze-drying. Samples were shielded from light.
